verses.roman:
eita kahiluṅ prathama puruṣera tattva
dvitīya puruṣera ebe śunaha mahattva

synonyms: eita—thus; kahiluṅ—I have explained; prathama puruṣera—of the first incarnation of the Personality of Godhead; tattva—the truth; dvitīya puruṣera—of the second incarnation of the Personality of Godhead; ebe—now; śunaha—please hear; mahattva—glories.
translation: "I have thus explained the truth of the first Personality of Godhead, Mahā Viṣṇu. I shall now explain the glories of the second Personality of Godhead.
